title: How did your business suffer in this pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only solace is not only myself but also all the businessmen are in the same boat l The Pandemic brought untold hardships to all those businessmen and jeopardize their yearly Planning’s and goals. I am in travel and tourism business. All are closed. Hotels and resorts are turned into Corona wards .Instead of tourist occupancy the hotels are occupied with corona victims l Our business are interlinked with road, train and air services. We have to wait until these services are start to functioning
